title: Introducing: joan
body:
**joan** are, as is so often the case nowadays, purposefully elusive.

One track on Soundcloud, alongside one grainy photo of the duo, and no location or names attached – yeah, we’ve seen this story quite a few times before, but that doesn’t stop their debut track, _With Somebody Else_, being a brilliant first offering. In the same way that both The 1975 and LANY appear to draw elements from classic mid 90’s boybands (namely Backstreet Boys in this case), there’s a slightly sugary, but still killer edge to the songwriting – more than enough of mark them out as one to watch. Check out With Somebody Else below.
